comment: Life is too short :) He should be around 74 here and he doesn'T even a gray hair. I wonder what he is eating & doing to stay that young.
"life is too short to get the sign right",so funny:D
oh, I hate physics examples. I was good at physics, but that was only in high school. Since I chose a different major in college, I have totally forget those terms in physics.
